methodref.name: GenerateBmp
methodref.description: Return a blob containing the contents of a windows .BMP formatted QRCode image.

methodref.name: GenerateBmpFile
methodref.description: Create a .BMP file containing a QRCode image.

methodref.name: GenerateJPegFile
methodref.description: Create a .JPEG file containing a QRCode image.

methodref.name: GenerateJpeg
methodref.description: Return a blob containing the contents of a .JPEG formatted QRCode image.

methodref.name: GeneratePng
methodref.description: Return a blob containing the contents of a .PNG formayted QRCode image.

methodref.name: GeneratePngFile
methodref.description: Create a .PNG file containing a QRCode image.

methodref.name: GenerateRTF
methodref.description: Return RTF embedded image string for a QRCode image.

methodref.name: GenerateSVG
methodref.description: Return SVG embedded string for a QRCode image.
